summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2008 PONTIAC G6. THE CONTACT NOTICED STRONG FUEL FUMES EMITTING OUTSIDE THE VEHICLE. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO A REPAIR SHOP, PLACED ON A LIFT FOR INSPECTION, AND WAS DIAGNOSED THAT THERE WAS A FRACTURE ASSOCIATED WITH THE FUEL PUMP AND THE FUEL TANK. THE VEHICLE WAS TO BE FURTHER DIAGNOSED BY THE MECHANIC AND REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE AND PROVIDED NO REMEDY. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 100,000.
